website_summaries.verdict: The OluKai Moloa has garnered a lot of fans and return-purchasers over the years. Its unique style has caught the attention of many shoppers who love that it quickly transforms appearances. You can be wearing this pair of slip-on walking shoes at the office and be ready to hit the beach without changing out of them. Despite a few hiccups, it comes highly recommended for the comfort it offers and versatility.
pros: A vast majority of users rave about how comfortable the OluKai Moloa is for everyday wear
Almost all of the buyers love the versatile design of this pair of walking shoes
The durability of this trainer exceeds the expectations of a large number of owners
Many folks appreciate the slip-on style of this footgear
Numerous reviewers laud the grippy outsole
A lot of people are delighted that this model can be worn during warm and cold weather without any issues
The style of this footwear pairs well with shorts and pants, says multiple shoppers
Several individuals find the arch support to be adequate
cons: Some wearers need to wear thick socks because the boxy forefoot of the Moloa felt too roomy
A few repeat purchasers wish this model was offered in more colors
A commenter has complained that the sides of the footgear were too high and that they hit her ankle bones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic color, design, quality and comfort, but watch the sizing feedback.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 10. A bit sloppy even with socks, but a great look and are quite comfortable. In comparison, I recently purchased Olukai Honua in size 10-1/2 - and are a good fit for my size 10 feet - but are still smaller than these size 10 Moloa Kapas. Pay attention to fit feedback before purchasing. Olukai are fantastic shoes, but maybe size consistency is an issue, ordering online.

product_meta.title: OluKai Men's Moloa Kapa Slip On Shoe
product_meta.description: Revitalized and modernized, the Moloa Kapa is sophisticated and approachable; a staple for Spring and Summer seasons.
feature_bullets: On your feet all day? Might as well enjoy it with the laid-back and comfy Moloa Kapa loafer.
Fold down heelstay transforms the shoe into a slide.

Microfiber suede lining. Rigid cellulose fiber insert for stability. Serdia™ antimicrobal and anti-odor treatment for constant freshness. Microfiber suede footbed covering with a soft polyurethane base GEL insert in the midsole for all-day comfort. Full-grain leather outsole with non-marking, molded rubber traction pads for added grip.
